name: PerMuVAR
short_description: PerMuVAR was a library for the Computer Algebra System MuPAD (http://www.mupad.de) for computations in invariant rings of permutation groups. It's now part of the algebraic combinatorics package MuPAD-Combinat (http://mupad-combinat.sf.net/)
